conversion_verification.notes: Successful volumetric 3D extrusions clearly based on the provided floor plan geometry.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent isometric-style projection with consistent wall heights and thicknesses.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity in wall placement; bedroom proportions and adjacencies are strictly maintained from the original blueprint.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture is mapped accurately to the 2D plan, including specific orientations (e.g., the circular seating in Bed Room 2 and M. Bed Rm).

visual_clarity.notes: Rendering is clean but loses points due to text label contamination within the 3D model space (E6).

detected_errors.description: Hallucinatory and slightly garbled text labels overlaying the 3D geometry.

summary: An accurate and geometrically faithful 3D conversion that meticulously preserves the layout and furniture arrangement of the source floor plan.
